name: Fabrik  Design System 2.0 (Demo)
description:
Fully stacked design system - Upgrade to get all the components.


Build for Auto-Layout, Highly Scalable! (unlike other kits, you'll find this is better optimized & tested, as we're using this as a starting point for all our projects).


What you'll get:

  • Typography (uses Inter)
  • Colors (AI generated & manually curated)
  • Forms (inputs,dropdowns, checkboxes, radio buttons, switches and more)
  • Tables
  • Alerts & Modals
  • Sliders
  • Charts
  • Wizzards & On-boarding Steps
  • Navigation (vertical & horizontal)
  • Icons (Microsoft Fluent - open source).


Might be compatible with some popular front-end frameworks.


Get the full version on gumroad.
